page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: In the past Ruabon had 5 schools,an infants school,a junior school,a Church in Wales primary school, and at secondary level,a boys' grammar school and a girls' grammar school. Today,the infants school and the junior school have been amalgamated to form one primary school-Ysgol Maes-y-llan with 111 pupils.St. Mary's church school has been replaced with a new building on the same site with 231 pupils.Two new schools,an infants school with 147 pupils,a junior school with 111 pupils were built at Rhosymedre.The two grammar schools have been amalgamated with two secondary modern schools into a comprehensive school-Ysgol Rhiwabon 921 pupils.Lindisfarne College,a private school,moved to the outskirts of Ruabon from Yorkshire in 1950.
